content:
Not sure if that has been discussed before but I had this suggestion coming my way.
people are very used to whatsapp and skype where received messages are left aligned and msgs sent right-aligned by using a margin.
Could this be done for Zulip as well?
skype web

The margin scheme is also used for iPhone texting. I think adding margins in Zulip would be a tough sell, partly because we strive to keep us as much content on the screen as possible, at least in the stream view. There may be other ways to make it a little more clear which messages you sent. If we were to do a UI experiment along these lines, I could see us trying it out in PM views first.
The Skype and other chat apps approach is to actually show the avatar on left and on right respectively. The total of margins for each message could remain the same.
Another variation would be to change the alignment of the person's name.
